text: Yisakale imana aniche allahe'i te'omlokara abhibharaka, te'om te'omlokaka andhakarara paraa uliya'i poharara phale lai yaya; arau yisakale kuphurai karaiche taguta sihamtara abhibharaka, ihamte sihamtaka poharara paraa andhakarara pine lai yaya. Sihamte'i jahannami, tata sihamta cirakala arasthana karaiba
